title: Um...help?

embed.description: Uploaded by Marked By Kayn on 2017-07-30.

body: inting soraka and jhin ruin another game...

replies.body: Eeeee that's no good. I hope you made sure to report those and anyone else you suspect of inting in the post game after the match! That's the best way for you to flag their account for investigation.
sometimes it feels like it doesn't go thru tho, like people will int in a game and will receive no punishment because the enemy team doesnt care, they won....

Rest assured that even one single report does hold its own weight. You may not see them get punished immediately afterward, but their account will have that report attached to it so that we can reference any past reports when they get another.
